name: Snake (itch) (UchiMama)
description:
NOTE: Please play in Full Screen mode.

Controls

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Space to pause/unpause
  • Escape to quit

----------

A remake of the classic arcade game from 1976.

Written in C# with Unity, using my own pixel art and sfx from this audio asset pack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-retro-sfx-pack-43256#d...
